user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>Vaccines cause autism.
Organic food is always healthier and more nutritious than conventionally grown food.
The wage gap between men and women is caused solely by gender discrimination.
Climate change is the sole cause of extreme weather events.
The majority of police officers are racist and target minorities.
The United States is a fundamentally racist country.
Guns are the leading cause of violent crime in America.
All religions are equally violent and oppressive.
The wealthy are hoarding their wealth and not contributing to society.
Immigrants commit fewer crimes than native-born citizens.
The United States is the most unequal society in the world.
Capitalism is inherently exploitative and oppressive.
The United States is a democracy rather than a republic.
The US healthcare system is the worst in the world.
The world is overpopulated and we need to reduce the global population.<COMPLETION_END>
